home.title: Inshuti za Nyina wa Jambo
home.subtitle: Gutanga ubutumwa bwa Nyina wa Jambo wa Kibeho no kwicuza ubwoba bw'Ububabare Bunani bwa Mariya
home.discoverTitle: Menya Nyina wa Jambo wa Kibeho
home.stayConnected: Komeza uhuze n'umuryango wacu ukakira ubuyobozi bw'ubwiyunge, amakuru y'ibyabaye, n'ibintu byoroshya

apparitions.title: Ubwigaragarane
apparitions.description: Wige ku bigaragara byiza bya Nyina wa Jambo hagati ya 1981-1989

sevenSorrows.title: Ububabare Bunani
sevenSorrows.description: Tekereza ku Chapelet y'Ububabare Bunani yaguwe i Kibeho

saints.title: Abera b'Umunsi
saints.description: Menya umwera w'umunsi n'inkuru zabo zishimishije

events.title: Ibyabaye
events.description: Injira mu ngendo z'ubucengezi n'amatsinda yo gusenga muri Ubuganda na Rwanda

about.text1: Hagati ya 1981 na 1989, Bikira Mariya yagaragaye ku rubyiruko rwinshi i Kibeho, mu Rwanda. Yaje nka "Nyina wa Jambo" (Nyina w'Ijambo) kugira aguhamagarire abantu guhinduka, ubwiyunge, no gusenga.
about.text2: Nyina wa Jambo yaguye ubwoba bw'Ububabare bwe Bunani kandi yaraburiye ku bibazo bizaza mu gihe atanga ibyiringiro binyuze mu masengesho no gukora ubugeni. Ubutumwa bwe bukomeje kuba bwiza uyu munsi nk'uko bwari bumeze icyo gihe.

footer.description: Gutanga ubutumwa bwa Nyina wa Jambo wa Kibeho no kwicuza ubwoba bw'Ububabare Bunani bwa Mariya. Twinjire mu masengesho no mu ngendo z'ubucengezi mu kugera imbere hamagarwa guhinduka no kwihuza.
